framework

Class Mix

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.Mix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentReferences

    public class Mix
extends Object
implements ComponentReferences
    This class coordinates the components of this mix. Each component (offering methods) has its own (architecture) interface (see package architectureInterfaces) and a controller class (named "ComponentName"Controller), loading the current implementation of the according interface. Therefore, the implementation of each component can change, without changes to any other component (interface and implementing (controller) class remain the same).

    General information: A mix is some kind of proxy that attempts to hide the correspondence between its incoming and outgoing messages, as proposed by David Chaum in 1981.

    Author:
    Karl-Peter Fuchs, Daniel Kaiser

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mix

        public Mix()
        Constructor for the Mix, this constructor contains all steps to start mixing traffic. First, components are created, references are set, Implementation-classes are loaded and validated. After that, a keyPair is created which is used to initialize the components. Finally the mix starts to mix.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String... args)
        Creates a new Mix.
        Parameters:
        args - Not used.

      • generateComponents

        private void generateComponents()
        In this method, all components of the mix are generated.

        Note: the order of the components is important; do not change it!

      • registerComponent

        protected void registerComponent(Controller controllerToRegister)
        Every component is automatically registered in the mix as this method is called in the constructor of each controller. This is done, so that these components are accessible by all other components.
        Parameters:
        controllerToRegister - is the controller, which should be registered by the mix

      • getComponents

        public Controller[] getComponents()
        all controllers, that belong to this mix
        Returns:
        all controllers as an array

        this method sets references between all the components

        in this method, the corresponding Implementations are loaded and instantiated.

      • registerImplementation

        protected void registerImplementation(Implementation implementationToRegister)

        Parameters:
        implementationToRegister - is the implementation, which should be registered by the mix
